${ModID}:OlFaithful.NAME: Ol' Faithful
${ModID}:OlFaithful.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Ante. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Hit: Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:HighRoller.NAME: High Roller
${ModID}:HighRoller.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this is in your deck at the end of a combat, gain 4 Gold.

${ModID}:Sideye.NAME: Side-eye
${ModID}:Sideye.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Enemies gain 1 Strength.

${ModID}:Chatter.NAME: Chatter
${ModID}:Chatter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has positive Strength, they lose !M! Strength this turn.

${ModID}:UpMySleeve.NAME: Up My Sleeve
${ModID}:UpMySleeve.DESCRIPTION: Spin the Wheel. NL If you landed on a card, add a copy of it with Retain and Exhaust into your hand.
${ModID}:UpMySleeve.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spin the Wheel. NL If you landed on a card, add a copy of it with Retain and Exhaust into your hand. NL It costs 0 until played.

${ModID}:Swipe.NAME: Swipe
${ModID}:Swipe.DESCRIPTION: Steal the enemy's Block. NL Apply !M! Weak.

${ModID}:DoubleOrNothing.NAME: Double or Nothing
${ModID}:DoubleOrNothing.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Ante. NL Scry !M!. NL Play the top card of your draw pile.

${ModID}:QuickFlip.NAME: Quick Flip
${ModID}:QuickFlip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade the bottom !M! cards of your draw pile this combat.

${ModID}:SetDown.NAME: Set Down
${ModID}:SetDown.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your hand on the bottom of your draw pile. NL It costs 0 until played.

${ModID}:SelfImprovement.NAME: Self Improvement
${ModID}:SelfImprovement.DESCRIPTION: Give a card in your hand Retain and + !M! Block and Damage this combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ChipToss.NAME: Chip Toss
${ModID}:ChipToss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 5 times.

${ModID}:WildCard.NAME: Wild Card
${ModID}:WildCard.DESCRIPTION: Choose ANY card in your master deck. NL Add a copy of it into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FourOfAKind.NAME: Four of a Kind
${ModID}:FourOfAKind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Four of a Kinds deal !M! additional damage this turn.

${ModID}:HeartOfTheCards.NAME: Heart of the Cards
${ModID}:HeartOfTheCards.DESCRIPTION: Draw the bottom card of your draw pile. NL Give it + !M! damage this combat.

${ModID}:Mulligan.NAME: Mulligan
${ModID}:Mulligan.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Ante. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL Spin the Wheel. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:DeckDrop.NAME: Deck Drop
${ModID}:DeckDrop.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Ante. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:NoMe.NAME: No, Me
${ModID}:NoMe.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has positive Strength, steal up to !M! of it. NL Draw 1 card.

${ModID}:HoardHarry.NAME: Hoard Harry
${ModID}:HoardHarry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have 3 or more Strength, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:ScrapShield.NAME: Scrap Shield
${ModID}:ScrapShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If there are 10 or more cards in your draw pile, gain !B! Block again.

${ModID}:MirrorFaced.NAME: Mirror Faced
${ModID}:MirrorFaced.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Create a copy of it.
${ModID}:MirrorFaced.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Create a copy of it. NL It costs 1 less.

${ModID}:CasinoChaos.NAME: Casino Chaos
${ModID}:CasinoChaos.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card with 'random' in its text, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.
${ModID}:CasinoChaos.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a card with 'random' in its text, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:GoldRush.NAME: Gold Rush
${ModID}:GoldRush.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Ante. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Gain Gold equal to the unblocked damage dealt. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EyesOnThePrize.NAME: Eyes on the Prize
${ModID}:EyesOnThePrize.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Spin the Wheel, draw 1 card.
${ModID}:EyesOnThePrize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Spin the Wheel, draw 1 card. NL Spin the Wheel.

${ModID}:CollectPrizes.NAME: Collect Prizes
${ModID}:CollectPrizes.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Ante. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each time you Spinned the Wheel this combat.

${ModID}:DoubleDown.NAME: Double Down
${ModID}:DoubleDown.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Copy your hand except for Double Down. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:JustAHunch.NAME: Just a Hunch
${ModID}:JustAHunch.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Exhaust the bottom card of your draw pile. NL If it was an Attack, gain 1 Strength. NL Otherwise, gain 1 Dexterity.

${ModID}:BookieBeatdown.NAME: Bookie Beatdown
${ModID}:BookieBeatdown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card from your hand on the bottom of your draw pile.

${ModID}:PokerFace.NAME: Poker Face
${ModID}:PokerFace.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose 1 Strength. NL Gain that much Strength. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:PokerFace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose 1 Strength. NL Gain that much Strength +1. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CounterfeitCards.NAME: Counterfeit Cards
${ModID}:CounterfeitCards.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a non-Ethereal card, add an Ethereal duplicate into your hand.

${ModID}:OrganizedHavoc.NAME: Organized Havoc
${ModID}:OrganizedHavoc.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Ante. NL Play the bottom card of your draw pile and Exhaust it.

${ModID}:TychesGift.NAME: Tyche's Gift
${ModID}:TychesGift.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand and draw that many cards. NL Gain !B! Block for each card discarded.

${ModID}:CallYourBluff.NAME: Call Your Bluff
${ModID}:CallYourBluff.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Reduce the cost of the bottom card of your draw pile by 1 this combat.
${ModID}:CallYourBluff.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Reduce the cost of the bottom card of your draw pile to 0 this combat.

${ModID}:Pickpocket.NAME: Pick Pocket
${ModID}:Pickpocket.DESCRIPTION: Steal !M! Block from an enemy. Any excess is gained as Gold. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:AllIn.NAME: All In
${ModID}:AllIn.DESCRIPTION: Play the bottom card of your draw pile twice. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:AllIn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play the bottom card of your draw pile thrice. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Roulette.NAME: Roulette
${ModID}:Roulette.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Ante. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL ${ModID}:Hit: Gain 7 Gold.

${ModID}:RaiseTheStakes.NAME: Raise The Stakes
${ModID}:RaiseTheStakes.DESCRIPTION: Increase the damage and Block of cards in your hand by 2. NL Enemies gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:TinyTells.NAME: Tiny Tells
${ModID}:TinyTells.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the bottom card of your draw pile is a Skill, apply 1 Weak.

${ModID}:SnakeEyes.NAME: Snake Eyes
${ModID}:SnakeEyes.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable to a random enemy !M! times. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Boxcars.NAME: Boxcars
${ModID}:Boxcars.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you spin the wheel, increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:LuckyToken.NAME: Lucky Token
${ModID}:LuckyToken.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you Spin the Wheel, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

${ModID}:Fold.NAME: Fold
${ModID}:Fold.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Ante. NL Next turn, gain [E] [E] and draw 2 cards.

${ModID}:PullFromNothing.NAME: Pull From Nothing
${ModID}:PullFromNothing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return an Exhausted card to your hand.
${ModID}:PullFromNothing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return an Exhaust card to your hand and Upgrade it.

${ModID}:BetOnOdds.NAME: Bet On Odds
${ModID}:BetOnOdds.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw an odd-cost card, shuffle an Ethereal copy that costs !M! less into your draw pile.

${ModID}:BetOnEvens.NAME: Bet On Evens
${ModID}:BetOnEvens.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw an even-cost card, gain 2 Block.
${ModID}:BetOnEvens.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you draw an even-cost card, gain 2 Block.

${ModID}:QuickStopShop.NAME: Quick Stop Shop
${ModID}:QuickStopShop.DESCRIPTION: Pay !M! Gold. NL Choose one: Obtain a random potion, an additional card reward, or ALL enemies lose 13 HP. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Jackpot.NAME: JACKPOT!!!
${ModID}:Jackpot.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Ante. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL ${ModID}:Hit: Deal !${ModID}:sd! damage to a random non-Boss enemy.

${ModID}:OnTheHouse.NAME: On the House
${ModID}:OnTheHouse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Ante a card from your hand. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.

${ModID}:BlueChipBarrier.NAME: Blue Chip Barrier
${ModID}:BlueChipBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Gold during combat, gain that much Block. NL Gain 5 Gold.

${ModID}:CountingCards.NAME: Counting Cards
${ModID}:CountingCards.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw a card, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your draw pile.
${ModID}:CountingCards.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, draw a card, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your draw pile.

${ModID}:EyeFromAbove.NAME: Eye From Above
${ModID}:EyeFromAbove.DESCRIPTION: The next time you spin the Wheel, its effects happen twice.
${ModID}:EyeFromAbove.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next !M! times you spin the Wheel, its effects happen twice.

${ModID}:LuxuriousLifestyle.NAME: Luxurious Lifestyle
${ModID}:LuxuriousLifestyle.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! * X Gold. NL Enemies gain X Strength and X Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:LuxuriousLifestyle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! * X Gold. NL Enemies gain X Strength and X+1 Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:MatchingCall.NAME: Matching Call
${ModID}:MatchingCall.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy gains Strength, gain that much Strength.
${ModID}:MatchingCall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy gains Strength, gain twice that much Strength.

${ModID}:CurioCollection.NAME: Curio Collection
${ModID}:CurioCollection.DESCRIPTION: Pay !M! Gold. NL Gain a Relic. NL Fleeting.
${ModID}:CurioCollection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Pay !M! Gold. NL Gain a Relic. NL Purge.

${ModID}:TuneUp.NAME: Tune Up
${ModID}:TuneUp.DESCRIPTION: Pay !M! Gold. NL Increase the damage and Block of cards in your hand by 2 permanently. NL Fleeting.
${ModID}:TuneUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Pay !M! Gold. NL Draw 1 card. NL Increase the damage and Block of cards in your hand by 2 permanently. NL Fleeting.

${ModID}:HeavyHit.NAME: Heavy Hit
${ModID}:HeavyHit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you Spin the Wheel, this costs 1 less this combat.

${ModID}:AnotherHit.NAME: Another Hit
${ModID}:AnotherHit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the bottom card of your deck is an Attack, play it.

${ModID}:GalacticGamble.NAME: Galactic Gamble
${ModID}:GalacticGamble.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all cards in your hand and replace them with random ones from other colors. NL They cost 0. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:GalacticGamble.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all cards in your hand and replace them with random Upgraded ones from other colors. NL They cost 0. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CallousClub.NAME: Callous Club
${ModID}:CallousClub.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Spin the Wheel, its effects happen twice. NL Remove struck cards from the Wheel permanently.
${ModID}:CallousClub.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you Spin the Wheel, its effects happen twice. NL Remove struck cards from the Wheel permanently.

${ModID}:HeftyHeart.NAME: Hefty Heart
${ModID}:HeftyHeart.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Ante. NL Increase the damage, Block and special effects of cards in your hand by 1 this combat. NL Gain !M! Temporary_HP. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:MorosGift.NAME: Moro's Gift
${ModID}:MorosGift.DESCRIPTION: Pay !M! Gold. NL Choose to either find two cards from your draw pile or add 3 random cards into your hand, and they cost 0. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:MorosGift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Pay !M! Gold. NL Choose to either find two cards from your draw pile or add 3 random cards into your hand, and they cost 0.

${ModID}:FullHouse.NAME: Full House
${ModID}:FullHouse.DESCRIPTION: If you draw two or more of the same card at the start of your turn, give them !M! increased damage and Block this combat.

${ModID}:CalledIt.NAME: Called It
${ModID}:CalledIt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Guess a card type, then draw the bottom card of your draw pile. NL If you guessed correctly, deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:StarchipStalwart.NAME: Starchip Stalwart
${ModID}:StarchipStalwart.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Ante. NL Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Hit: Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:GamblerForm.NAME: Gambler Form
${ModID}:GamblerForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Spin the Wheel and gain !M! Gold.

${ModID}:NoU.NAME: No, U
${ModID}:NoU.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Reflect all blocked damage.

${ModID}:SlickSpade.NAME: Slick Spade
${ModID}:SlickSpade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, ${ModID}:Ante a random card with *Ante in your deck permanently.

${ModID}:SmartInvestment.NAME: Smart Investment
${ModID}:SmartInvestment.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Ante. NL Put a *Pile *Of *Gold on the bottom of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:AceInTheSleeve.NAME: Ace in the Sleeve
${ModID}:AceInTheSleeve.DESCRIPTION: Put the cards in your hand up your sleeve. NL Draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:FortunosSleeve.NAME: Fortuno's Sleeve
${ModID}:FortunosSleeve.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Increase the damage and block of ALL cards in your sleeve by 2. NL Play a card in your sleeve, then return this to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FortunoCoin.NAME: FortunoCoin!
${ModID}:FortunoCoin.DESCRIPTION: When you go to the next act, remove this from your deck and gain !M! Gold.

${ModID}:DiamondDagger.NAME: Diamond Dagger
${ModID}:DiamondDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose where the Wheel will next land. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:DiamondDagger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose where the Wheel will next land.

${ModID}:RiggedDeck.NAME: Rigged Deck
${ModID}:RiggedDeck.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand to draw all copies of. NL Increase their damage and Block by 2.
